name: Golden Dream
description: Golden Dream is an interactive digital space which the audience will interact in a digitally immersive, narrative environment. Golden Dream is based on a non-linear narrative and the main storyline explores the story of a young female flower seller who committed a suicide after being the victim of the Peer to Peer (P2P) Lending financial scam in China 2020. It is not a game, it is an experimental exploration of storytelling in digital space.
